meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Sanguinaria, especially Sanguinaria canadensis, also known as bloodroot.
meanings.sent1: The bloodwort in the garden has bright red flowers.
meanings.sent2: People use bloodwort in herbal medicine for its healing properties.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel planted bloodwort seeds in the wrong spot.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as rosy as bloodwort petals in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The forest floor was carpeted with delicate bloodwort leaves.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Achyranthes, especially Achyranthes aspera, also known as bloodwort.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist recommended bloodwort to treat inflammation.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, bloodwort is believed to bring good luck.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added bloodwort instead of parsley to the soup.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in hues reminiscent of bloodwort flowers.
meanings.sent5: The ancient manuscript mentioned the mystical properties of bloodwort.
